trans-unit.source: Create a BizTalk Service project to process invoices
trans-unit.target: Create a BizTalk Service project to process invoices

trans-unit.source: The topics in this section demonstrate how to create the <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_Invoice</embeddedLabel> <token>af_integration</token> project.
trans-unit.target: The topics in this section demonstrate how to create the <embeddedLabel>CloudCar_Integration_Invoice</embeddedLabel> <token>af_integration</token> project.

trans-unit.source: The <token>af_integration</token> project includes the following components:
trans-unit.target: The <token>af_integration</token> project includes the following components:

trans-unit.source: A SQL Server <token>lobtarget</token> to insert invoice data into a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: A SQL Server <token>lobtarget</token> to insert invoice data into a SQL Server database.

trans-unit.source: Custom code component within the <token>msgflow_proj</token>, which uses the SQL Server <token>lobtarget</token> to write data to the SQL Server database and send an e-mail with the invoice details to the customer.
trans-unit.target: Custom code component within the <token>msgflow_proj</token>, which uses the SQL Server <token>lobtarget</token> to write data to the SQL Server database and send an e-mail with the invoice details to the customer.

trans-unit.source: Finally, you connect the components, build the project, and deploy it.
trans-unit.target: Finally, you connect the components, build the project, and deploy it.
